product_name: Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Handheld Water Bottle
long_description: One of the most comfortable insulated flasks ever, the Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Handheld Water Bottle allows a natural grip and easy-squeeze access to fluids. 18 fl. oz. SpeedDraw(TM) flask offers quick bursts of fluid; it features double-wall insulation, high-visibility reflectivity and a race cap. Fully adjustable hand strap with thumbhole enables grip-free running. The Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Handheld Water Bottle features a large, expandable zippered pocket that can carry a phone, keys, ID and other running essentials.
short_description: One of the most comfortable insulated flasks ever, the Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Handheld Water Bottle allows a natural grip and easy-squeeze access to fluids.
